name: Soft Drinks
description: Choose from a variety of refreshing soft drinks, including classics like cola, lemon-lime soda, and root beer, served with plenty of ice. Free refills are included!

name: Coffee
description: Enjoy a freshly brewed cup of aromatic coffee made from our special blend of beans. Whether you prefer it black, with cream, or sweetened, our coffee is the perfect way to wrap up your meal.

name: Iced Tea
description: Cool off with a glass of our house-brewed iced tea, available in sweetened and unsweetened varieties. Garnished with a lemon slice, it's a classic choice for a refreshing beverage.

name: Fruit Juice
description: Quench your thirst with a selection of 100% pure fruit juices. Choose from options like orange, cranberry, or pineapple to enjoy a burst of natural fruit flavors with your meal.
